title: Allow alphabetic characters in Admin Panel price inputs

requirements.text: Fix the Admin Mode product price inputs so admins can type alphabetic characters (alphanumeric) in the price box without the UI preventing keystrokes, while preserving existing behavior: (1) store/show the typed alphanumeric text as the product’s display price, and (2) continue extracting and using a numeric-only price value for the WhatsApp “Buy Now” message/link generation.

quotes: Allow me to add alphabets in prise box admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: In Admin Mode, the inline product price edit input accepts letters as you type (e.g., typing "A50" or "MRP 299" is not blocked).
In Admin Mode, the Add Product form price input accepts letters as you type (e.g., "A50" is not blocked).
After saving an edited product price containing letters, the product card displays the full alphanumeric price text in the UI (including the letters).
For any alphanumeric price input, the WhatsApp “Buy Now” link continues to use a numeric-only price value (letters are excluded from the WhatsApp message price portion).
If the admin enters a price that contains no valid numeric value > 0 after extraction, show the existing English validation error message (do not allow save/add).
Do not introduce any new non-English user-facing text.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components must be composed, not edited).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the app frontend-only for product/admin logic; do not add backend canister logic for this request.
nonGoals: Adding server-side persistence for products or admin changes.
Changing the WhatsApp phone number (918240316884) or the Buy Now/Help message templates.
Adding new admin features beyond making the price inputs accept alphabetic characters.
